Module com.example.conversordemonedaalurachallengesone
Package com.example.conversordemonedaalurachallengesone

Interface Finance

public interface Finance
This interface provides methods to perform currency conversions using exchange rate web service that is update once a day.

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static CurrencyData
    convertCurrency(String from, String to)
    Converts a source currency to a target currency.

  • Method Details

    • convertCurrency

      static CurrencyData convertCurrency(String from, String to) throws InterruptedException, IOException
      Converts a source currency to a target currency.
      Parameters:
      from - The source currency.
      to - The target currency.
      Returns:
      A CurrencyData object containing tha conversion information.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the execution of the application is interrupted.
      IOException - If an input/output error occurs during the HTTP request.
